citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 am on
01-Feb-17.
Inspector knocked on the licensee front door and honked the horn on the vehicle. Attempted to contact licensee by
telephone and a left message. A business card was left on the front door. Inspector departed from the facility at
11:30 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 am on
01-Feb-17.
Inspector knocked on the licensee front door and honked the horn on the vehicle. Attempted to contact licensee by
telephone and a left message.  A business card was left on the front door.  Inspector departed from the facility at
11:30 am.
